title: Tulip Chair Upholstered
body: In 1956, Saarinen said he was designing a collection to "clear up the slum of legs in the U.S. home." In Time Magazine and later that year he introduced his Pedestal Table and Tulip™ Chair Collection and because of the slender, elegant stem like pedestals and organic shapes its popularity spread like a wildfire and up to this day, the design is still style worldwide. Whether paired with the Saarinen dining table or any other modern table, the tulip chair will definitely blend any interior.
